title: Park Radio
synopsis: Park Radio is an internet radio station that is designed to connect people using sound, music and storytelling, to celebrate the 150th anniversary of public parks around the world - [http://parkradio.org parkradio.org]

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Here I write and research about the [[Park Radio]] project, which seeks to create live events and podcasts bases around stories and histories of [[Pubic Park]]s around the world.
